item.title: Geek Vacation 2016
item.author: [email protected] (Bruno P. Kinoshita)
item.description: I just had a two week vacation, and I tried to use my time to rest, play some music, and complete a geek todo-list. The list included things that I used some time ago but wanted to refresh my memory, things that I already used but never spent time reading the manuals, and other things that I saw somewhere but never actually used in any project. Here the complete list, with the items that were completed highlighted.
